Set up a "printer scavenger hunt" game where you have to find different objects around the office or house to print, such as a picture of a favorite animal or a recipe card.
Create a "printable art challenge" where you have to print out a blank canvas and use it to create a piece of art every day.
Start a "printer photo album" where you print out your favorite photos and arrange them in a physical album.
Create a "printer-based scavenger hunt" where you have to print out clues and riddles that lead you to different locations around the office or house.
Set up a "printer-based obstacle course" where you have to print out a series of tasks and challenges that you have to complete in order to finish the course.
